visualization_prompt: Generate a line chart showing monthly trends with actual/prognosis segmentation using zone-based dash styles

title.text: Monthly Sales Performance with Prognosis Indicator

subtitle.text: Dashed line represents forecasted values from September

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 12 monthly observations of sales revenue (quantitative continuous) across categorical time intervals. Synthetic data exhibits bimodal distribution with μ=125.1k and σ=62.3k, showing summer peak and Q4 decline. The line chart maximizes data-ink ratio by using minimal visual differentiation between actual/prognosis zones, while Cairo's salience principle is maintained through strategic use of dash styles. Zone segmentation at x=8 (September) reflects real-world fiscal year planning cycles, with dotted prognosis using D3.format-style numeric annotations for clarity.
